Description:
Welcome to Apt Resources, a recruitment company that provides premium services to esteemed clients. We are currently seeking a friendly and experienced Female Housekeeper to join the team of one of our clients a Royal Family in Abu Dhabi. The successful candidate will have the opportunity to work in a luxurious environment and be part of a dynamic team.As a Female Housekeeper for our Royal Family, you will be responsible for providing excellent housekeeping services, ensuring a clean and well-maintained household. With your keen eye for detail and passion for hospitality, you will contribute to the seamless running of this prestigious residence.Ensure all rooms are cleaned and maintained to a high standard
Prepare and make beds, change linens, and ensure laundry is done in a timely manner
Create a welcoming atmosphere for guests and maintain a courteous attitude
Take care of antiques, artwork, and valuable possessions in the residence
Organize and manage the household inventory efficiently
Ensure maintenance issues are reported and resolved promptly
Work with the maintenance team and other staff to ensure a smooth and efficient operationJob Details
